title: Analysts' Weekly Ratings Changes for S & T Bancorp (STBA)
text:
Several analysts have recently updated their ratings and price targets for S & T Bancorp (NASDAQ: STBA): 8/21/2015 – S & T Bancorp was upgraded by analysts at Zacks from a “hold” rating to a “buy” rating. They now have a $34.00 price target on the stock.   8/19/2015 – S & T Bancorp was downgraded by analysts at Zacks from a “buy” rating to a “hold” rating.   8/12/2015 – S & T Bancorp was upgraded by analysts at Zacks from a “hold” rating to a “buy” rating. They now have a $34.00 price target on the stock.   8/11/2015 – S & T Bancorp was downgraded by analysts at Zacks from a “buy” rating to a “hold” rating.   7/23/2015 – S & T Bancorp had its “buy” rating reaffirmed by analysts at Keefe, Bruyette & Woods. 7/22/2015 – S & T Bancorp had its price target raised by analysts at Keefe, Bruyette & Woods from $31.00 to $33.00. They now have an “outperform” rating on the stock. 7/22/2015 – S & T Bancorp was upgraded by analysts at Zacks from a “hold” rating to a “buy” rating. They now have a $37.00 price target on the stock.   7/22/2015 – S & T Bancorp had its price target raised by analysts at RBC Capital from $29.00 to $32.00. They now have a “sector perform” rating on the stock. 7/22/2015 – S & T Bancorp was downgraded by analysts at Piper Jaffray from an “overweight” rating to a “neutral” rating. They now have a $32.00 price target on the stock, up previously from $30.00. They noted that the move was a valuation call. They noted that the move was a valuation call. 
S & T Bancorp Inc ( NASDAQ:STBA ) traded up 2.372% during mid-day trading on Thursday, reaching $29.995. The company’s stock had a trading volume of 58,153 shares. S & T Bancorp Inc has a 1-year low of $23.07 and a 1-year high of $32.88. The firm has a market capitalization of $1.04 billion and a price-to-earnings ratio of 15.671. The firm has a 50-day moving average of $30.62 and a 200 day moving average of $29.00. 
S & T Bancorp (NASDAQ:STBA) last announced   earnings per share   earned $62.20 million during the quarter, compared to analyst estimates of $59 million. During the same quarter last year, the company earned $0.49 EPS. Equities analysts expect that S & T Bancorp Inc will post $2.04 earnings per share for the current year. 
The company also recently disclosed   issued a $0.18 dividend. The ex-dividend date of this dividend was Tuesday, August 4th. 
In other news, Director James Thomas Gibson sold 75,000 shares of the stock in a transaction dated   sale was disclosed in a document filed with the SEC, which is available at this link .
